entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 6.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nanaimo Airport 12:00 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

Temperature: 6.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 63 %

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. A few showers beginning before morning except a few wet flurries over higher terrain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. A few wet flurries over higher terrain early in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 22 January 2023
